username_changes_description: We've made improvements to the referral system. If your username has changed, don't worry: your previous referrals remain intact and your new referral code is now your current username.
support_help: Your support helps us continue improving the platform
thanks_support: Thank you for supporting the TRIBO VAULT project!
reward_message: You will be rewarded with great care from the TRIBO team always üòéü§ù
footer_text: The best way to stake your CDT
how_works_desc: Tribo Vault allows you to earn daily rewards based on the amount of CDT tokens you have in your wallet.
earn_daily: Earn 0.1% daily by staking your CDT tokens
choose_name: To continue, choose your Triber name. This will be your permanent identifier on the platform and you won't be able to change it later.
benefit1: Earn 0.1% daily on your CDT balance
benefit2: No lock-up period - your tokens are always available
benefit4: Claim your rewards whenever you want
connect_wallet: Connect your World Wallet to start earning rewards
app_designed: This app is designed to work in World App
scan_qr: Scan the QR code with your phone to open in World App
step1_desc: Authenticate with World Wallet to access your dashboard
step2_desc: The system automatically detects how many CDT you have in your wallet
step3_desc: Receive 0.1% daily on your CDT balance directly in your wallet
footer_home: Tribo Vault - The best way to stake your CDT
click_mascot: Click me to check your Wallet status today!
verify_human_detective: Click me to verify you're human!
verify_human_explanation: TRIBO Vault is exclusively for humans. This verification helps us maintain a secure platform and prevent bots.
detectriber_message: I'm DETECTRIBER and I want to verify you're not a ü§ñ
share_referral_code: Share your referral code with friends and earn rewards when they join
friends_must_use: Your friends must use this code when registering
friends_must_use_exact: Your friends must use exactly this username as a referral code
no_referrals_yet: You don't have any referrals yet
share_to_invite: Share your code to start inviting friends
invited_by_friend: Were you invited by a friend? Enter their referral code here
referral_contest_description: Top referrers will share a prize pool of 10,000 CDT!
join_referral_contest: Join our referral contest and win up to 5,000 CDT!
country_selection_description: Select your country to personalize your experience and connect with other users from your region.
country_optional: Selecting a country is optional, but it helps us improve your experience
welcome_gift_description: Thanks for joining Tribo Vault. Claim your 1 CDT welcome gift!
select_country_description: Help us improve your experience by selecting your country. This allows us to personalize content and connect you with other users from your region.
